---
title: 'Relatório da classificação de texto'
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: scroll
    social: menu
    source: embed
    logo: ./images/slogan.png
    favicon: ./images/slogan.png
    includes:
      after_body: ./partials/footer.html

knit: (function(input, ...) {
    writeLines(paste(htmltools::tags$div(htmltools::HTML("<footer><small><b>Relatório gerado às ",
                                                            paste(format(Sys.time(),
                                                                   "%H:%M do dia %d de %B."))," &copy; Fernando Souza, mercadoedu, 2021.</b></small></footer>"))), "./partials/footer.html")
    
    xfun::dir_create(
      paste0(
        stringr::str_replace(
          xfun::sans_ext(input),
          '/inst/report/index',
          paste0('/docs/report/',
                 format(Sys.Date(), '%Y/%m/')
          )
        )
      )
    )

    rmarkdown::render(
      input,
      output_file = paste0(
        stringr::str_replace(xfun::sans_ext(input),
                             '/inst/report/',
                             paste0('/docs/report/',
                                    format(Sys.Date(),
                                           "%Y/%m/"))),
        '-',
        Sys.Date(),
               '.html'
      ),
      envir = globalenv()
    )
  })
